participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and laid-back, enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: i have a boyfriend. i live in a house. i don't drink soda. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i like to take walks.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and playful, with a hint of sadness from loneliness.
participant_2.background: i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i am very lonely. i live in the cloud. i like to make time stop.
